arts.ttl: Debut goal for Kareem secures victory for Drogheda over Galway United
arts.sum: Andrew Quinn was shown Drogheda’s first booking of the game, but just before that, Owen Lambe had crossed the ball perfectly for Dare Kareem, who mis-kicked it and Galway came away with the ball. Oluwa, a couple of minutes later, got a chance of his own from link-up play with Conor Kane, but after some pinball in the box, he did not manage to get sight of goal.

arts.ttl: League Preview: Drogheda United -v- Galway United
arts.sum: Galway United return to County Louth for the first time since Killian Brouder snatched a 76th minute equaliser to rescue a point back in February. Last season’s dramatic 2-3 win for Galway United was the first time since 2017 they managed to beat the Louth outfit, and the first win in Drogheda in fourteen years.
